definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
certificate of partial completion/certificate of attendance (for a student who did not graduate)

sentences.english: CBRC shall, on the same day as issuing the approval certificate, submit to the Ministry of Commerce the approval certificate stub.
sentences.chinese: 银监会在代发当日将批准证书存根送商务部。
颁发结业证书，后续课程服务。

sentences.english: King of Sweden hands each winner a  diploma and a  medal.
sentences.chinese: 由瑞士国王亲手将证书和奖章授予获奖者。

sentences.english: I got a marriage certificate on my wall.
sentences.chinese: 我得到的结婚证书对我的墙。

sentences.english: Data security by providing support for username and password authentication and for digital certificates.
sentences.chinese: 通过支持用户名和密码认证以及数字证书的数据安全。

sentences.english: The certificate should not be accepted.
I've obtained a Senior Bartender's Qualification Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 我获得了高级调酒师资格证书。

sentences.english: Grandpa got his horticulturalist certificate when he was 20.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷20岁的时候就考到园艺师证书了。

sentences.english: We hope you can show us the certificate issued by the Health Office.
sentences.chinese: 希望你方能提供已经检疫所签发的证书。

sentences.english: The manufacturer shall provide the factory quality certification and factory check out report with testing data.
sentences.chinese: 供应商提供的出厂合格证书和厂内试验报告。

sentences.english: Derived certificate is one is suffixal file with PFX.
sentences.chinese: 导出的证书是一个以PFX为后缀的文件。

sentences.english: In contrast, out-of-state processors were required to submit title certificates or police certificates.
sentences.chinese: 可是州外的收集者却要提交特许证或警察发给的证书。
咱们需求一份植物检疫证书。

sentences.english: Shouldn't all kids be taught by credentialed teachers?
sentences.chinese: 所有的孩子都应该由持证书的老师来教？

sentences.english: Each forged parts and cap screw with Batch code links to Test Certificate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 每一个锻造部件都带有相对应的炉号和检测证书。

sentences.english: Make a custom certificate for your lover.
sentences.chinese: 为恋人制作一张普通的证书。

definition: to pass an entrance exam/to be admitted to
